dmca.title: [ABUSE] Hostee Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 13, 2004 11:05 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Hostee Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: James Mathias <admin@1lotus.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Friday, December 10, 2004, 6:14:02 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Hostee Copyright Infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============
I am contacting you to make you aware of possible legal action that may
take place against one of your hostees.

The Administrator at http://thetechcafe.net/ has been sent the attached
cease and desist and has chosen to ignore it.

I would like my work removed from his server space and or the site taken
down.

I can and am willing to provide any and all proof necessary of my
ownership of said works creation and authorship copyrights.

This is also being sent to the administrator John Conway, and the
Registrar

Thank You, for choosing Onelotus Creative!

James A. Mathias
- - Artistic Outlaw
- - Internet Developer
Onelotus Creative
- -  <http://www.1lotus.com/> http://www.1lotus.com
- - admin@1lotus.com
- - (503) 977 - 6500
leihu Entertainment
- -  <http://www.leihu.com/> http://www.leihu.com
- - admin@leihu.com




===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBvcvCvK/XpJs6oyURAkCgAJ9PvEMY/uz0DcHrfgGRtP9LkonD+gCggQeX
9tubPBDWwcF4RxfdOrLde6Q=
=M+B7
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
